alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:58PM CDT until April 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MCPHERSON COUNTY... At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tryon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central McPherson County. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 191 and 203. Highway 97 between mile markers 32 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
